name: Rare Riff
description: Found much less frequently than the common Riff, this Rare Monster nonetheless offers great insights into the habits and behaviours of this secretive species. For instance, it's now known that all Riffs share a symbiotic relationship with their guitars, which are actually living creatures as well! Riffs exchange the foods they collect with their toes for whispered messages of affirmation about their musical performances. Go team.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 6 day 30 min, Enhanced Time: 22 hr 52 min 30 sec
